text: Bulma is a fictional character from the manga and franchise Dragon Ball created by Akira Toriyama. She is introduced as a young but brilliant scientist girl searching for the magic Dragon Balls in order to make a wish. In her research he met Goku and later Yamcha, who will be is her boyfriend for a long time. Later on she married Vegeta and had a child with him: Trunks. Category:Dragon Ball characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984
title: Bulma
